channel.title: Comments on: Mine of Karishh Solo â€“ Grendel Mission (Systems)

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: You might also mention that the same Hildryn build that is so survivable/damaging that you recommended for the other missions works here too for a bit more active of an approach. This can speed up the mission time by quite a bit if you can get more than the minimum out of each extractor. Thanks for these Grendel guides, super helpful!
item.content:encoded:
You might also mention that the same Hildryn build that is so survivable/damaging that you recommended for the other missions works here too for a bit more active of an approach. This can speed up the mission time by quite a bit if you can get more than the minimum out of each extractor.
Thanks for these Grendel guides, super helpful!
